exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap i, j : nat z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hle : (S j <= i)%nat IHj : (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (f_1 m) j (Iter (f m) i z) = Iter (f m) (i - j) z Hf : f_1 m (f m (Iter (f m) i z)) = Iter (f m) i z Unable to unify "Iter (f m) (i - S j) z" with "f_1 m (Iter (f_1 m) j (Iter (f m) i z))".

original: intros m i j z Hmap Hexd Hle. induction j. -- simpl. rewrite Nat.sub_0_r. reflexivity. -- simpl. rewrite <- IHj. assert (Hf : f_1 m (f m (Iter (f m) i z)) = Iter (f m) i z). ++ apply f_1_Iter_f. auto. auto. ++ rewrite Hf. reflexivity.
